item.description:
Hi Gals!
Let's all reconnect this Sunday at one of the tastiest and most reasonable creperies in NYC "Euro Delights," and it happens to be in our neighborhood!!
Enjoy savory or sweet crepes whatever suits your fancy, and have great conversation and company!
Space is limited for this event because it can get crowed at the restraint, so please expect to wait no more than 15-20 minutes for a seat. But believe me, for the treat and the price it is worth the wait!!
Sign up is first come first serve!!
item.how_to_find_us: We will be waiting outside the restaurant at 1:00pm
item.name: Gold Member Event: SUnday EARLY LUNCH WITH THE LADIES!!!
